DOC.criteria: Advanced Myeloma measurable disease least 2 previous regimen . Life expectancy > 3 month . Performance status ECOG < 2 . Prior antineoplastic therapy within 4 week prior inclusion . No high dose steroid within 7 day prior screen . Severe condition .
